titles.title: He is able - He is able

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
He is able - He is able
I know my Lord is able
I know my Lord is able
to carry me through (repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He healed the broken-hearted
He set the captives free
He made the lame to walk again
And He caused the blind to see
(Alleluia)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He is able - He is able
I know the Lord is able
I know the Lord is able
to carry us through (repeat)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He heals the broken-hearted
He sets the captives free
He makes the lame to walk again
And the blind He makes to see
(Alleluia)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He is able - He is able
I know the Lord is able
I know the Lord is able
to carry us through!
